sentences.sContent: Lines AB and CD are parallel. AB
Take the road running parallel to the main road just after the village.
sentences.sCn: 过那个村子后走与主干道平行的路。

sentences.sContent: ...The damage to American craftsmanship seems to parallel the steep slide in manufacturing employment...

phrases.pCn: 并行的；[电]并联的；平行的
并行输入；并网；并联输入
平行线；并联线路；并行线路

remMethod.val: para(类似) ＋ llel → 类似的； 平行的

trans.tranCn: 并列的，平行的；类似的；对应的；并联的
trans.tranOther: two lines, paths etc that are parallel to each other are the same distance apart along their whole length

trans.tranCn: 可相比拟的事物，相似处；平行线，平行面；纬线
trans.tranOther: a relationship or similarity between two things, especially things that exist or happen in different places or at different times

trans.tranCn: 与…相似， 与… 相当， 比得上
trans.tranOther: if one thing parallels another, they happen at the same time or are similar, and seem to be related
